ingredients.item: 125g pack essential Waitrose Italian Lighter Mozzarella, drained and sliced

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200ÂºC, gas mark 6.
Prick the whole aubergines with a fork and bake for 30 minutes. Cool slightly then halve. Scoop out the flesh leaving a 1cm border and place on a baking tray.
Mix together the chicken and beetroot and spoon back into the aubergine shells. Top with the mozzarella and bake for a further 10 minutes.
